examples: to dismiss a suggestion/a claim/an idea
rechazar una sugerencia / una afirmación / una idea
The criticisms were summarily dismissed by the government.
Las críticas fueron desestimadas sumariamente por el gobierno.
Rob is quick to dismiss the notion that his trip was horrific.
Rob se apresura a descartar la idea de que su viaje fue horrible.
I think we can safely dismiss their objections.
Creo que podemos descartar con seguridad sus objeciones.
